game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers are afraid to venture out at night, and the village elder has called upon brave adventurers to investigate the cause of these events.
game.objective: Investigate the source of the disappearances in Oakwood village

tasks.description: Speak to the villagers and gather information about the disappearances
tasks.objective: Gather clues about the source of the disappearances

tasks.description: Explore the surrounding forest and search for any signs of foul play
tasks.objective: Find evidence of a dark cult operating in the area

game.title: The Missing Villagers of Oakwood
